alert.note: Alert for Clark; Coles; Douglas; Edgar; Moultrie (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Coles, Edgar, southeastern Moultrie, northwestern Clark and southern Douglas Counties through 530 AM CDT... At 459 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Arthur to 6 miles east of Chrisman. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Arcola and Arthur around 505 AM CDT. Humboldt around 515 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Allenville, Cooks Mill, Paris, Mattoon and Vermilion. This includes Interstate 57 between mile markers 188 and 210. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
